entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Marystown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 1:30 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 5.6°C
Wind: 28 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
